event.title: the worst outbreak of the cough in 60 years

data.event: Health officials are referring to the event as the worst outbreak of the cough in 60 years.

event.title: occurred in infants under three months

data.event: A spokesman from the California Department of Public Health, Michael Sicilia, says all of the deaths occurred in infants under three months and that nine of the deaths were found in infants under eight weeks old.

event.title: were found in infants under eight weeks

data.event: A spokesman from the California Department of Public Health, Michael Sicilia, says all of the deaths occurred in infants under three months and that nine of the deaths were found in infants under eight weeks old.
Earlier in July of this year California recommended that anyone over seven years old who was not fully vaccinated for Pertussis get a Tdap pertussis booster.

event.title: seven years old who was not fully vaccinated

data.event: Earlier in July of this year California recommended that anyone over seven years old who was not fully vaccinated for Pertussis get a Tdap pertussis booster.

event.title: miss the symptoms of whooping cough in infants under six months

data.event: Doctors and parents often miss the symptoms of whooping cough in infants under six months old due to the absence of the "whooping" sound.
